Given the linear fractional transformation of $x$ into $\displaystyle{
  f_1(x) = \frac{2x - 1}{x + 1}
}$,
define $f_{n + 1}(x) = f_1(f_n(x))$ for $n = 1, 2, 3, ...$. It can be shown that $f_{35} =
f_5$. Determine $A$, $B$, $C$, and $D$ so that $\displaystyle{
  f_{28}(x) = \frac{Ax + B}{Cx + D}
}$.
